basics.name: Mike Jandreau
basics.label: Web Developer & Graphic Designer
basics.summary: I'm a bit of a Jack of all trades with a fairly diverse set of skills and interests. When I'm not designing and programming my way through life, I like to play guitar, read sci-fi books, and draw stupid comics.

work.summary: Colby College is a private liberal arts college in Waterville, Maine. Approximately 1,800 students from more than 60 countries are enrolled annually. The college offers 54 major fields of study and 30 minors.
highlights: Develop, document, support, and maintain websites and online tools
Integrate multimedia content into the Libraries' virtual presence
Maintain up-to-date knowledge of emerging web development technologies and apply them where appropriate

work.summary: Losaidos Design is a Maine based web and graphic design company, providing high quality multimedia design services.
highlights: Build accessible websites with visual appeal that are easy to navigate
Meet clients to discuss project overview, budget, timeline, and deliverables
Create logos, business cards, letterhead, and other branding materials
Code designs into working websites using HTML5, CSS3, and JavaScript
Maintain backups and Git repositories for client sites

work.summary: Pulse is a full service marketing and advertising agency located in Bangor, ME, offering online marketing services including web design, SEO, & paid search.
highlights: Strategize brand development, website traffic growth, UI & UX
Record music and voiceovers for radio/TV ads
Shoot and edit video for web and broadcast
Quality check and validate code prior to site launch

education.institution: University of the District of Columbia
education.area: Studio Art w/focus in Graphic Design

awards.title: Maine Calling Theme Song Search
awards.summary: I wrote and recorded the new theme music for the radio program Maine Calling on Maine Public Radio. http://www.mainepublic.org/post/maine-calling-theme-song-search#stream/0

references.name: Gary Cohen
references.reference: Mike can draw a recognizable Boba Fett in like, ten seconds. It's unreal.

references.name: John Q. Sample
references.reference: I don't know how he does it, but Mike can eat a rack of ribs and then go for a 5 mile run. I freaking hate that guy.
